name: Boo Ninja Fruit
description:
Play Fruit Ninja Upon to explore the nuances of slashing fruit.

The Boo Ninja have to train so as to prepare for the incoming invasion of enemies. The Boo fruit ninja are practicing to defend them by far the highest level of slashing fruit. Boo Ninja is using blade to slash fruit, Boo ninja's action are so fast and skillful

You can collect coin and upgrade your character or your map, which you like. There are three types of special fruit: Frenzy, Frezze, Double score, try to cut them and get bonus functions. Play this game to explore these amazing functions.

How to play Fruit Ninja Upont:

- Touch on the left of screen to cut fruit

- Touch on the right of screen to turn around

- Multi fruit are cut, more time plus

- You will get more coins according to the continually exact slash

Features in Fruit Ninja Upon:

- Multiple Ninja upgrades, skills and backgrounds.

- The lively and incentive sound

- Leaderboards

- Facebook share

- In-app purchase

There has never been a better time to play this minigame now and become the master Ninja of slashy hero: Boo Ninja of Fruit Ninja Upon

P/s: We we are looking for a publisher collaborator or co-operate with other team to bid out-source code. If you have demand and intention to co-operate with us, Please contact with us via this facebook link: https://www.facebook.com/StomStudio
